home.title: Premium Curated Fleet
home.subtitle: Hand-picked vehicles ready for leasing or credit from 2.9%. Browse our selection or search for the perfect match.

about.title: About Nextcar
about.metaDescription: Learn about Nextcar — our story, mission, and commitment to helping you find the right vehicle with leasing and credit options.
about.intro: We curate a premium fleet of used vehicles and make it easy to drive away with leasing or credit from 2.9%.
about.ourStoryText: Nextcar was founded to simplify how people find and finance their next car. We combine a hand-picked inventory with transparent leasing and credit options so you can focus on the drive, not the paperwork.
about.missionText: Our mission is to save your time and money by offering a curated selection of quality vehicles and straightforward financing. Every car we list is selected with care, and every deal is designed to be clear and fair.
about.why1: Curated inventory: only vehicles that meet our standards.
about.why2: Leasing and credit from 2.9% with fast approval.
about.why3: Transparent process and personal support when you need it.

import.title: Import Service
import.metaDescription: Import your vehicle with Nextcar — process steps, benefits, and how we help you bring your car to your country.
import.intro: We help you import your next vehicle with a clear process, support at every step, and no surprises.
import.whatWeOfferText: Our import service covers sourcing, documentation, customs clearance, and registration support. Whether you are buying from our inventory or bringing a car from abroad, we guide you through the process so you can drive legally and with peace of mind.
import.step1Text: Tell us what you want — make, model, budget — and we outline options and costs.
import.step2Text: We source the vehicle and handle the purchase and necessary paperwork.
import.step3Text: We assist with customs clearance and registration in your country.
import.step4Text: You receive your vehicle ready to drive, with documentation in order.
import.benefit1: One point of contact for the entire import process.
import.benefit2: Clear cost breakdown and no hidden fees.
import.readyToImport: Ready to import? Get in touch and we will walk you through the next steps.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.metaDescription: How to find, choose, and finance your next car with Nextcar — step-by-step process, FAQ, and what to expect.
howItWorks.intro: From browsing to driving — here is how we help you get into your next vehicle with leasing or credit.
howItWorks.step1Text: Explore our curated inventory online. Use search and filters to find makes, models, and price ranges that fit you.
howItWorks.step2Text: View details, photos, and specs. When you are ready, get a quote or schedule a test drive — we will guide you through financing options (leasing from 2.9% or credit).
howItWorks.step3Text: Submit your application. We work with partners for fast approval so you know quickly whether you are approved and on what terms.
howItWorks.step4Text: Complete the paperwork and pick up your vehicle. We ensure everything is in order so you can hit the road with confidence.
howItWorks.faq1Q: Do I need to visit in person?
howItWorks.faq1A: You can browse, get a quote, and start the process online. A visit or test drive can be arranged when you are ready.
howItWorks.faq2Q: What financing options do you offer?
howItWorks.faq2A: We offer leasing (from 2.9%) and credit with fast approval. Terms depend on your profile and the vehicle — we will explain options clearly.
howItWorks.faq3Q: Can I import a car through you?
howItWorks.faq3A: Yes. We provide an import service — from sourcing and purchase to customs and registration. See our Import Service page for details.
howItWorks.trustText: We only list vehicles that meet our quality standards. Pricing and financing terms are presented clearly, and we are here to answer your questions before and after you decide.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.metaDescription: Get in touch with Nextcar — email, phone, and contact form. We are here to help you find and finance your next vehicle.
contacts.intro: Have a question or ready to get started? Reach out by phone, email, or use the form below.
contacts.respondWithinDay: We typically respond within one business day. For urgent inquiries, please call.

metadata.siteDescription: The vehicle that will save your time and money is just a few clicks away.
